title: 一直支持川普的侃爷，突然宣布竞选2020美国总统
contents:
Kanye West announces he's running for president
The controversial rapper will have to defeat friend Donald Trump.It's unclear whether he's consulted with his friend Donald Trump, but rapper Kanye West has announced he's ready to unseat the Republican president.

"We must now realize the promise of America by trusting God, unifying our vision and building our future," West wrote on Twitter Saturday evening. "I am running for president of the United States! #2020VISION"



来源于 ABC新闻链接
